name.jp: ボルケード(4%)カード(S)の欠片

description.en: Gather 10 of these to get a Volcano Card (4%) from Peach.
description.ar: Gather 10 of these to get a Volcano Card (4%) from Peach.
description.br: Reúna 10 pedaços para conseguir uma Carta Vulcão (4%) com a Peach.
description.cns: 收集10个该物品可以找皮奇换一个熔岩卡片(4%)。
description.de: Sammle 10 Teile und tausche sie bei Peach gegen 1 Volcano Card (4%).
description.fi: Gather 10 of these to get a Volcano Card (4%) from Peach.
description.fil: Gather 10 of these to get a Volcano Card (4%) from Peach.
description.fr: Rassemblez 10 morceaux et amenez-les chez Angie à Flarine qui vous les échangera contre une Carte Volcano (4%)
description.id: Kumpulkan 10 di antaranya untuk mendapatkan Volcano Card (4%) dari Peach.
description.it: Gather 10 of these to get a Volcano Card (4%) from Peach.
description.jp: 火山から吹き出した溶岩が固まったものと言われています。10個でボルケーノ(4%)カード(S)1個と交換できます。
description.kr: 해당 조각 10개를 모으면 피치로부터 볼케이노 카드(4%)를 받을 수 있습니다.
description.nl: Gather 10 of these to get a Volcano Card (4%) from Peach.
description.pl: Gather 10 of these to get a Volcano Card (4%) from Peach.
description.ru: Gather 10 of these to get a Volcano Card (4%) from Peach.
description.sp: Reúne 10 de estas para obtener una Carta Volcán (4%) de Peach.
description.sw: Gather 10 of these to get a Volcano Card (4%) from Peach.
description.th: รวบรวม 10 อันเพื่อรับVolcano Card (4%) จาก Peach
description.tw: 蒐集10個碎片到波奇那兌換火山卡片 (4%)吧
description.vi: Thu thập 10 trong số này để nhận được Thẻ núi lửa (4%) từ Peach.
